Title: A Little Thing Called Love
Writer: Voraluk Klasukon, Puttipong Pormsaka Na-Sakonnakorn, Wasin Pokpong
Actors: Pimchanok Leuwisetpaiboon, Mario Maurer, Tangi Namonto, Yanika Thongprayoon
Plot: Life of a 14 year old girl Nam, who falls in love with her senior of tenth grade P'Shone and tries desperately to win his attention.
